thread.section_title: Easyprint UK Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Easyprint UK | easyprint.com
thread.title: Yael B
thread.title_full: Easyprint UK bewertet von Yael B

author: Yael B
title: Yael B
text:
I got some business cards from Easyprint, I just uploaded my design onto their system and filled out my details. There is a design maker there too, but I didn't use it. It was as easy as that. The cards came in about a week, they are good quality and fit for purpose.
My only suggestion for improvement is the payment methods, in order not to be charged for using a card when paying, I had to pay via Bank Transfer, which was a faff. I don't think a big company these days should be charging customers for using a credit or debit card to pay for products.
